p: Colour of the essential oil was determined by physical observation in day light and under ultraviolet radiation using an ultra-violet chamber [ 16]. The essential oil from water distillation was dissolved in methanol (10% v/ v) and scanned for the absorbance with the wavelengths ranging from 220 to 500 nm by an UV-visible spectrophotometer (SPECTROstar Nano; BMG LABTECH, Offenburg, Germany) [ 17].
